name: Status Engage
tag_list: social-media-marketing, seo, search-engine-optimization-services, local-search-marketing, web-design, brand-management, internet-marketing
overview:
Social media marketing made easy for small business!

StatusEngage is a top ranked provider of social media marketing services; including Facebook and Twitter advertising, campaign management, social media education and web services geared towards small businesses, musicians, and entrepreneurs. We build your social channels and help you establish social credibility by increasing your company’s Facebook fans, Twitter followers and exposure across the ‘net. Our packages include creation or enhancement of social networking channels including Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, Google+, Pinterest and many more.

We believe creating an incredible presence on the top social networking sites across the web should be easy, fast, (and perhaps, even fun). We’re good at what we do, so you can do what you do best - your business.

Whether your customers are around the corner or around the world, it’s time to stake your claim in the social media landscape and start reaping the benefits. Contact us today and we’ll have your custom branded social media presence up and running in no time.
